import { Paper, Typography } from '@mui/material' import { Box } from '@mui/system' import React from 'react' function TotalPrice({ bill, items }) { return ( PRICE DETAILS
Price({items ? items.length : 0}items) ₹{bill} Discount -₹0 Delivery Charges ₹40
TOTAL AMOUNT ₹{bill ? (40 + bill) : (0)} ) } export default TotalPrice
